input.sentences: this is a picture of a woman with her dog .
this is a picture of a dog .
this is a picture of a couple .
this is a picture of a restaurant .
this is a picture of a building .
output.sentences: The woman took a picture with her dog.
She loves to take pictures of her dog.
She then took pictures of a couple.
She wanted to get a picture at the restaurant and asked the couple to take it.
She wanted to take pictures of the beautiful building the restaurant was in.
